thread.title: Big-League Brother Is Watching, Say Orwell’s Unlikely New Fans
thread.title_full: Big-League Brother Is Watching, Say Orwell’s Unlikely New Fans - WSJ

author: Joseph Rago
title: Big-League Brother Is Watching, Say Orwell’s Unlikely New Fans
text:
Postelection trauma hasn’t subsided. In fact, its sufferers have been performing ever more distraught and operatic displays of emotion. Witness the cottage industry now dedicated to the intersectionality between Donald Trump and George Orwell.

As “1984” climbs the best-seller lists, rising to No. 1 on Amazon, critic after critic is meditating on the literary rediscovery. What did the 1949 novel predict, anticipate or otherwise...
